articles.title: Thyroid cancer greater risk for obese men - Australian Associated Press
articles.description: Being overweight is more likely to cause thyroid cancer in men, than in women, a new Australian study shows.
articles.content:
Current obesity levels will explain 10,000 cases of thyroid cancer in the next 10 years and most of those will be men, a new Australian study shows.
